JOB DESCRIPTION: JOB DESCRIPTIONIndividual Contributor having Strong knowledge and Hands on Experience of doing projects in C#, ASP.Net, MVC, Web API.Hands on experience in Client side languages like JavaScript, Jquery or Angular JS.Good understanding in Microsoft Technologies like ASP.NET Web Applications, LINQ to Entities.Strong knowledge in Database Management System (DBMS) - SQL Server in writing/Debugging SQL queries example Stored Procedure, functions, Database Design and Structuring.Good knowledge in Bootstrap.Working exposure to Agile/Scrum methodologies.Strong Knowledge in HTML, CSS and knowledge of Object Oriented Programming Concepts.Knowledge of debugging web API.Qualification and Experience: 9 to 15 years of experience into full stack web application development.Excellent communication skills.Candidates from product development companies.A bachelors degree (B.E/ B.tech) related to IT domain (CSE,E&C, IT, ISE, EEE).If the degree is a B.Sc or BCA, then MCA would be mandatory.Minimum  60 % score throughout academics is preferred.Roles and Responsibilities
